participant_abstract.sent: We finalized some design ideas -- the remote controll will be battery-powered, with a rubber or rubber-and-plastic case.
The handle will be rubber like a stress ball and conform to the user's hand.
The main input will be an iPod-style wheel supplemented by a few necessary buttons.
The color options for the remote will be based on fruits and vegetables to conform to current fashion.

participant_actions.sent: PM - write meeting minutes and final report.
ID and UID - build a prototype.

participant_decisions.sent: Incorporate fruit/vegetables into the design (perhaps base the colors on fruit?).
Some part of case is replaceable for changing colors.

participant_problems.sent: Still not sure which part of the remote's case will be replaceable and offered in multiple colors.
